Mary Kitagawa (nee Murakami; amuru ya 1935) OBC bu onye nkuzi Canada
Dị ka onye Japan-Canadian na-etolite na British Columbia, e debere ezinụlọ ya n'ogige ụlọ ọrụ Japan dị iche iche n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ nakweere ọkwá na Kitsilano Secondary School ma mesịa nye ya akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na Mahadum British Columbia.

A mụrụ Kitagawa ma zụlite ya na Salt Spring Island, British Columbia n'ezinụlọ mmadụ ise. Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, e jidere nna ya dịka akụkụ nke njide nke ndị Canada Japan n'ofe ụsọ oké osimiri British Columbia n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ.  Ndị ezinaụlọ ya ndị ọzọ ga-emecha sonyere nna ya n'ogige Internment dị iche iche wee nwetakwa ugbo ha. Mgbe agha ahụ biri, ọ laghachiri Salt Spring Island na 1954.

Kitagawa chọrọ ịmalite ọrụ nkuzi ya n'ụlọ na Salt Spring Island mana o chere ajọ mbunobi ihu n'ihi agbụrụ ya. N'ihi ya, ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Kitsilano Secondary School, ebe ọ ga-ezute di ya n'ọdịnihu. Mgbe amuchara ụmụ ya, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na-anọchi anya ma mesịa debanye aha na Mahadum British Columbia (UBC). N'afọ 2011, Kitagawa nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịkwado UBC ka ọ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ 76 nke Japan Canada bụ ndị a manyere ịpụ na UBC mgbe mwakpo ahụ mere na Pearl Harbor. O mechara bụrụ onye natara 2013 Queen Elizabeth II Diamond Jubilee Medal na National Association of Japanese Canadians Leadership Award. Kitagawa na di ya Tosh nọdụrụ na Community Council for the Landscapes of Injustice project na Mahadum Victoria.
N'afọ 2018, Kitagawa natara Order of British Columbia maka mbọ ọ na-agba maka ndị Japan Canada.
